definitions.definition: A large barrel for the storage of liquid , especially of alcoholic drinks. ( See a diagram of cask sizes. )
A casket ; a small box for jewels.
A brougham or other private carriage .
Obsolete form of casque ( “ visorless helmet ” ) .

main_definition: A large barrel for the storage of liquid , especially of alcoholic drinks. ( See a diagram of cask sizes. )
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A casket ; a small box for jewels.
( archaic , slang ) A brougham or other private carriage .
Obsolete form of casque ( “ visorless helmet ” ) .
